metadata.Title: CVE-2016-10123 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Firejail allows --chroot when seccomp is not supported, which might allow local users to gain privileges.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-10123` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

firejail - 0.9.38-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: firejail package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.9.38-1').
